post.description:
To login to get token you need fill in your email and password


Press try it out button to get token
After receiving the token you need to copy it then you can press the Authorize button and past the token in value field
Don't forget to put Bearer in front of the token
Example: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJodHRwOlwvXC9

requestBody.description:
Fill email and password below to get token
Click Schema to view data property

get.description: This API will Get list contact with condition below

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Number of page to get

Type: Number

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Total number of records to get

Type: Number

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
Find records with condition get result desire

Type: String
Seach type supported with <(like,=,!=,beetwen)>
With type search beetwen value like this created_at<beetwen>{$start_date}|{$end_date} format (Y/m/d H:i:s)
If multiple search with connect (,) before

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description:
Sort records by colunm

Type: String
Sort type supported with (DESC,ASC)
If multiple order with connect (,) before

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Get only the desired columns

Type: String

post.description:
This API will Create a contact with json form below


Press try it out button to modified

requestBody.description:
Name Description Required
fullname This is full name of contact true
email This is email of contact true if without phone
phone This is phone number of contact true if without email
address This is address of contact false
gender This is gender of contact false

Click Schema to view data property

post.description:
This API will Create a event with json form below


Press try it out button to modified

requestBody.description:
Name Description Required
event_title Title of ticket true
event_type Category of event true
Note Note of event true
event_location event venue false
remind_time time to remind true
remind_type type remind of event true ('date','daily','weekly','monthly','yearly')
handling_team handling parts true
handling_agent agent handling this event true
event_source source event true (contact,agent,customer)
event_source_id id of source event true

Click Schema to view data property

items.example: the event title field is required

requestBody.description:
Name Description Required
order_status This is status of order false
order_id This is id of order false
order_group This is order channel false
order_description This is description of order false
customer

(id customer or create customer with array below)
fullname This is name of customer true
phone This is phone of customer true
email This is email of customer true
address This is address of customer false
locate This is location of customer false
false
contact

(id contact or create contact with array below)
fullname This is contact name of contact true
phone This is contact phone of contact true
email This is contact email of contact true
address This is contact address of contact false
locate This is contact location of contact false
false
products
image_product Image of product false
code_product code of product true
name_product Product name true
cost_product cost of product false
price_product Price product for sell false
color_product Product color false
option_product Option of product false
gift_product gift when buy product false
notes_product notes for product false
true

requestBody.description:
Name Description Required
title Title of ticket true
content Content of ticket true
channel Channel sent request false (default = api)
priority Ticket importance false
category category id of ticket false
contact Use contact id if available
name Name of contact true
email Email of contact true if without phone
phone Phone of contact true if without email
false

post.description:
This API will Create a agent with json form below


Press try it out button to modified

requestBody.description:
Name Description Required
firstname The first name of agent true
lastname The last name of agent true
password Password (Password must contain at least one special character and number) true
password_confirmation Confirm password (valid to password) true
phone Phone number agent true
email Email address agent true
account_type Account type ( 'agent','supervisor','admin' ) true
perrmission Permission of agent true
role Role of agent ('sales','cs','telephonist') true
